Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25255 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-25255 affecting package qt5-qtbase for versions less than 5.12.11-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package qt5-qtbase is earlier than 5.12.11-14, affected by CVE-2022-25255
